p: In the present epidemic of COVID-19, metal health issues under-addressed since the National Health Commission of China announced a guideline for emergency psychological crisis intervention for the recent COVID-19 outbreak considering the psychosocial problems ( National Health Commission of China: NHC, 2020). In some previous epidemiological studies, depression, anxiety, negative psychological effect, panic attack, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium, and even suicidal tendency have found among the survivors of the SARS epidemic ( Maunder et al., 2003; Lee et al., 2007).
